whatsNewLinks.title: Conversational AI announcements at Microsoft Build 2021
whatsNewLinks.description: Find out more about our latest release, including Composer 2.0, new templates and enhanced authoring, testing and publishing capabilities.

whatsNewLinks.title: Announcing Enterprise Assistant Bot Template and Conversational UX Guide
whatsNewLinks.description: Find out more about the new Enterprise Assistant Bot template, to help you accelerate building high-quality enterprise assistants.

whatsNewLinks.title: Bot Framework Composer 1.3
whatsNewLinks.description: New preview features: Form Dialogs, Orchestrator and Package Manager

whatsNewLinks.title: Build 2020 updates
whatsNewLinks.description: Read all of the updates from the Build conference, including Composer GA and Bot Framework SDK v4.9.

whatsNewLinks.title: Microsoft Ignite 2020: Publish to Microsoft Power Virtual Agents
whatsNewLinks.description: Open a Power Virtual Agents topic in Bot Framework Composer, create a custom bot and publish back to Microsoft Power Virtual Agents.

whatsNewLinks.title: Microsoft Ignite 2020: Conversational AI
whatsNewLinks.description: Updates to Conversational AI include Microsoft Teams APIs, and new releases for .NET, JavaScript, Python and Java (preview 7).

whatsNewLinks.title: Microsoft Ignite 2020: Integration of QnA into Composer
whatsNewLinks.description: Updates including the addition of creation and management capabilities for QnA Maker knowledgebase and improvement of overall productivity.
